meanings.definition: The act of conferring or bestowing something, such as an honor or degree.
meanings.sent1: The conferments of awards brought smiles to the recipients' faces.
meanings.sent2: The university's conferments of degrees took place during the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The conferments of medals at the competition made the winners feel proud.
meanings.sent4: Her conferments of kindness upon others were always appreciated.
meanings.sent5: The conferments of titles in the kingdom were highly anticipated.

meanings.definition: The result of conferring or bestowing something, such as an honor or degree.
meanings.sent1: The conferments of honors were displayed proudly in the trophy case.
meanings.sent2: The conferments of recognition boosted the team's morale.
meanings.sent3: The conferments of gifts at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His conferments of trust upon his team members were well received.
meanings.sent5: The conferments of praise from the teacher motivated the students to work harder.
